genericContent.itemName: Sanyo 46" Class LCD 1080p 60Hz Internet Connected HDTV, DP46861
genericContent.shortDescription:
The Sanyo 46" Class LCD 1080p 60Hz Internet Connected HDTV features a brilliant 1080p Full HD picture for your viewing pleasure. Use the included USB adapter to connect wirelessly to the Internet. The wide screed of the 1080p LCD HDTV provides for wide viewing angles. The two 6 x 12 cm speakers with 10 w/ch give a very good quality sound output. With the help of the Internet Connected HDTV you could view more than 191 channels.

Note: You must have a source of HD programming in order to take full advantage of the Sanyo 46" LCD HDTV. Contact your local cable or satellite TV provider for details on how to upgrade.
genericContent.longDescription:
Sanyo 46" Class LCD 1080p 60Hz Internet Connected HDTV:
  • 46" Diagonal Full HD 1080p LCD
  • Wide screen 16:9 Aspect Ratio
  • Native Panel Resolution: 1920 x 1080 pixels
  • Wide Viewing Angles:178 H x 178 V Degrees
  • Refresh rate 60 Hz
  • Contrast Ratio 4000:1
  • Integrated Digital Clear QAM ATSC + Analog NTSC Tuner
  • 191 Total channels
  • Receives ATSC signal formats (including 480i/p, 720p and 1080i/p) converted to 1080p display
  • 802.11b/g/n Wireless Capable with USB adapter (included)
  • Netflix , Vudu, Twitter, Facebook capable (with an ISP subscription service)
  • 3D Y/C Digital Comb Filter
  • MTS/SAP Stereo & Digital Audio with Audyssey Dynamic Volume
  • Two 6 x 12 cm speakers with 10 w/ch
  • Picture Shapes: 1-7 (w/remote control PIX Size Key)
  • Picture Modes: Standard, Vivid, Theater, Stadium, Custom (includes H-Size & V-Size)
  • Sound Modes: Standard, Vivid, Theater, Clear Voice, Custom ( includes Bass/Treble, Bass Extension, Equalizer (4 band), Audyssey Dynamic Volume, and Lip-Sync
  • XDS-Extended Data Service capability
  • V-Guide Parental Control
  • Trilingual Menus: English, Spanish, French
  • Closed Caption Compliant: NTSC-608, ATSC-708CC
  • Clock On Timer
  • Sleep Timer: 1/2 - 3 hours
  • Auto Shutoff
  • 3 HDMI (High Definition Multimedia Interface) inputs with HDCP ( HDMI 1 DVI compatible)
  • 2 HD Component (Y-Pb-Pr with R/L audio) inputs ( 1 Combo Composite-Component)
  • 1 Composite Input (V,L/R)
  • PC/Mac capable (VGA D-Sub 15 pin) with mini Audio input
  • 2 USB inputs with Photo Viewer for display of digital photos
  • 1 Coaxial Digital Audio Output
  • 1 Fixed Analog Audio Out (R/L)
  • 1 RF Input ( Analog/Digital Antenna In)
  • Detachable Stand / VESA 400 x 400 Wall Mountable (with optional kit not supplied)
  • Energy Star qualified
  • Energy Saving "ECO" menu setting (backlight) dimmer and Light Sensor
  • Dimensions w/stand: 43.88"W x 29.38"H x 10.63"D, 40.8 lbs.
  • Design, features, and specifications subject to change without notice
genericContent.shelfDescription: <li>46" diagonal screen size<li>HDMI Inputs: 3<li>Wall mountable<li>802.11b/g/n wireless capable
genericContent.supplierWarranty: 1 Year Limited Warranty - Parts and Labor
